ValidationRule.label: Checked Items

EnumProperty.Description: The predicate defining how the comparison is performed.

IntegerProperty.Description: The number of items to be matched.

ValidationRule.Description:
The Checked Items validation rule evaluates the total number of items checked in a component and compares it to a specific value.
The validation error message can be composed using the following placeholders:
  • ${propertyValue}: the field value
  • ${propertyName}: the field name
  • ${objectName}: the parent component name
  • ${itemCount}: the comparison item count
